snippet: The blood-covered girl, with puncture wounds to her neck and face, was found cradled in her babbling mother's arms in an apartment in Bedford-Stuyvesant before dawn on Friday. The girl's mother is in custody.
abstract: The blood-covered girl, with puncture wounds to her neck and face, was found cradled in her babbling mother's arms in an apartment in Bedford-Stuyvesant before dawn on Friday. The girl's mother is in custody.

byline.original: By AL BAKER and TIM STELLOH

lead_paragraph: 10:21 p.m. | Updated Officers responding early Friday to a call of a jumper on the roof of a four-story building in Brooklyn found a blood trail leading down to Apartment 4A. The door was ajar, and when they walked in, the police said, the picture got even worse: A young mother was sitting on a couch in the living room, babbling and cradling her fatally wounded 2-year-old girl.

headline.main: Mother in Custody After Death of Girl, 2, in Brooklyn
